entries.name: EvCAT
entries.info: Event Category, if >0:  e-, e-p, e-pi+.....

entries.name: NPGP
entries.info: Number of Final (Timed-based) Reconstructed Particles*100 + Number of Geometrically Reconstructed Particles

entries.name: TRG
entries.info: Trigger Type (CLAS12_e-, FT_CLAS12_h, CLAS12_H,...) + Prescale Factor for that Trigger

entries.name: Helic
entries.info: Helicity of Event (0 or 1, else undefined)

entries.name: status
entries.info: particle status (represents detector collection it passed)

entries.name: index
entries.info: index of the hit in the specific detector bank

entries.name: pindex
entries.info: row number in the particle bank hit is associated with

entries.name: detector
entries.info: Detector ID, defined in COATJAVA DetectorType

entries.name: path
entries.info: Path from vertex to the hit position (cm)

entries.name: hx
entries.info: X coordinate of the matched hit (cm)

entries.name: hy
entries.info: Y coordinate of the mathced hit (cm)

entries.name: hz
entries.info: Z coordinate of the matched hit (cm)

entries.name: m2u
entries.info: 2nd moment of the shower on U-side

entries.name: m2v
entries.info: 2nd moment of the shower on V-side

entries.name: m2w
entries.info: 2nd moment of the shower on W-side

entries.name: m3u
entries.info: 3rd moment of the shower on U-side

entries.name: m3v
entries.info: 3rd moment of the shower on V-side

entries.name: m3w
entries.info: 3rd moment of the shower on W-side

entries.name: nphe

entries.info: Path from vertex to the hit position (cm)

entries.info: DEPRECATED, TO BE REMOVED.  Theta of the matched hit (deg)

name: REC::VertDoca
info: Track Cross information for Particles bank

entries.name: index1
entries.info: index of the first track in Tracks bank

entries.name: index2
entries.info: index of the second track in Tracks bank

entries.name: x1
entries.info: x-position of the first track at the DOCA point (cm)

entries.name: y1
entries.info: y-position of the first track at the DOCA point (cm)

entries.name: z1
entries.info: z-position of the first track at the DOCA point (cm)

entries.name: cx1
entries.info: x-direction vector of the first track at the DOCA point (cm)

entries.name: cy1
entries.info: y-direction vector of the first track at the DOCA point (cm)

entries.name: cz1
entries.info: z-direction vector of the first track at the DOCA point (cm)

entries.name: x2
entries.info: x-position of the second track at the DOCA point (cm)

entries.name: y2
entries.info: y-position of the second track at the DOCA point (cm)

entries.name: z2
entries.info: z-position of the second track at the DOCA point (cm)

entries.name: cx2
entries.info: x-direction vector of the second track at the DOCA point (cm)

entries.name: cy2
entries.info: y-direction vector of the second track at the DOCA point (cm)

entries.name: cz2
entries.info: z-direction vector of the second track at the DOCA point (cm)

entries.name: pindex
entries.info: index of the particle in REC::Particle

entries.name: index
entries.info: index of the track in its tracking bank

entries.name: x
entries.info: x-position of the track at the detector surface (cm)

entries.name: y
entries.info: y-position of the track at the detector surface (cm)

entries.name: z
entries.info: z-position of the track at the detector surface (cm)

entries.name: cx
entries.info: direction cosline of the track at the detector surface

entries.name: cy
entries.info: direction cosline of the track at the detector surface

entries.name: cz
entries.info: direction cosline of the track at the detector surface

entries.name: pathlength
entries.info: pathlength of the track to the detector surface from the DOCA point (cm)

name: RECFT::Event
info: Event Header Bank, shadowing REC::Event with FT-based start time

entries.name: EvCAT
entries.info: Event Category, if >0:  e-, e-p, e-pi+.....

entries.name: pindex
entries.info: index of the (FT) particle used to determine start time

name: RECFT::Particle
info: Reconstructed Particle Information, shadowing REC::Particle with FT-based start time
